静电力

点电荷相互作用力

F⃗21=14πε0q1q2r122e⃗12\vec{F}_{21} = \frac{1} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{q_1q_2} {r_{12} ^2} \vec{e}_{12} F21​=4πε0​1​r122​q1​q2​​e12​

电力叠加原理

F⃗=∑i=1nF⃗i\vec{F} = \sum_{i=1} ^{n} \vec{F}_i F=i=1∑n​Fi​

静电场

电场强度

E⃗=F⃗q0\vec{E} = \frac{ \vec{F} } {q_0} E=q0​F​

场强叠加原理

E⃗=∑i=1nE⃗i=14πε0∑i=1nqiri2e⃗i\vec{E} = \sum_{i=1} ^{n} \vec{E}_i = \frac{1} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \sum_{i=1} ^{n} \frac{q_i} {r_i^2} \vec{e}_i E=i=1∑n​Ei​=4πε0​1​i=1∑n​ri2​qi​​ei​

带电体场强

E⃗=∫dE⃗=14πε0∫Vdqr2e⃗r\vec{E} = \int \mathrm{d} \vec{E} = \frac{1} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \int_V \frac{\mathrm{d} q} {r^2} \vec{e}_r E=∫dE=4πε0​1​∫V​r2dq​er​

常见场强模型

E⃗点电荷=q4πε01r2e⃗r\vec{E}_{点电荷} = \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1} {r^2} \vec{e}_r E点电荷​=4πε0​q​r21​er​

E直线=λ2πε01aE_{直线} = \frac{\lambda} {2 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1} {a} E直线​=2πε0​λ​a1​

E平面=σ2ε0E_{平面} = \frac{\sigma} {2 \varepsilon_0} E平面​=2ε0​σ​

E环=q4πε01R2+x23x−1E_{环} = \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{\sqrt{R^2 + x^2}^{3} x^{-1}} E环​=4πε0​q​R2+x2​3x−11​

E盘=q4πε02R2(1−xR2+r2)E_{盘} = \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{2}{ R^2}(1 - \frac{x}{\sqrt{R^2 + r^2}}) E盘​=4πε0​q​R22​(1−R2+r2​x​)

E球面={0r<Rq4πε01r2r>RE_{球面} = \begin{cases} 0 & r < R \\ \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{r^2} & r > R\end{cases} E球面​={04πε0​q​r21​​r<Rr>R​

E球体={q4πε01R3r−1r<Rq4πε01r2r>RE_{球体} = \begin{cases}\frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{R^3 r^{-1}} & r < R \\ \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{r^2} & r > R \end{cases} E球体​={4πε0​q​R3r−11​4πε0​q​r21​​r<Rr>R​

电荷密度

λ=dqdl\lambda = \frac{\mathrm{d} q}{\mathrm{d}l} λ=dldq​

σ=dqdS\sigma = \frac{\mathrm{d} q}{\mathrm{d}S} σ=dSdq​

ρ=dqdV\rho = \frac{\mathrm{d} q}{\mathrm{d}V} ρ=dVdq​

电通量

Φe=∫SdΦe=∫SEcos⁡θdS=∫SE⃗⋅dS⃗\varPhi_e = \int_S \mathrm{d} \varPhi_e = \int_S E \cos\theta \mathrm{d} S = \int_S \vec{E} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{S} Φe​=∫S​dΦe​=∫S​EcosθdS=∫S​E⋅dS

高斯定理

Φe=∮SE⃗⋅dS⃗=1ε0∑iqi\varPhi_e = \oint_S \vec{E} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{S} = \frac{1}{\varepsilon_0} \sum_i q_i Φe​=∮S​E⋅dS=ε0​1​i∑​qi​

静电场环路定理

∮LE⃗⋅dl⃗=0\oint_L \vec{E} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} = 0 ∮L​E⋅dl=0

电势

电势能

Wp=AP∞=∫P∞q0E⃗⋅dl⃗W_p = A_{P \infty} = \int^{\infty}_P q_0 \vec{E} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} Wp​=AP∞​=∫P∞​q0​E⋅dl

电势

UP=WPq0=∫P∞E⃗⋅dl⃗U_P = \frac{W_P}{q_0} = \int^{\infty}_P \vec{E} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} UP​=q0​WP​​=∫P∞​E⋅dl

电势差

Uab=Ua−Ub=∫abE⃗⋅dl⃗U_{a b} = U_a - U_b = \int^b_a \vec{E} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} Uab​=Ua​−Ub​=∫ab​E⋅dl

电场力所做的功

Aab=q0∫abE⃗⋅dl⃗=q0(Ua−Ub)A_{a b} = q_0\int^b_a \vec{E} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} = q_0 (U_a - U_b) Aab​=q0​∫ab​E⋅dl=q0​(Ua​−Ub​)

电势叠加原理

UP=∫dU=∫dq4πε0rU_P = \int \mathrm{d} U = \int \frac{\mathrm{d} q}{4\pi\varepsilon_0 r} UP​=∫dU=∫4πε0​rdq​

常见电势模型

U环=q4πε01R2+x2U_{环} = \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{\sqrt{R^2 + x^2}} U环​=4πε0​q​R2+x2​1​

U盘=q4πε02R2(R2+x2−x)U_{盘} = \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{2}{ R^2}(\sqrt{R^2 + x^2} - x) U盘​=4πε0​q​R22​(R2+x2​−x)

U球面={q4πε01Rr<Rq4πε01rr>RU_{球面} = \begin{cases} \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{R} & r < R \\ \frac{q}{4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{r} & r > R\end{cases} U球面​={4πε0​q​R1​4πε0​q​r1​​r<Rr>R​

U球体={q4πε012R(3−r2R2)r<Rq4πε01rr>RU_{球体} = \begin{cases} \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{2R} ( 3 - \frac{r^2}{R^2}) & r < R \\ \frac{q} {4 \pi \varepsilon_0} \frac{1}{r} & r > R \end{cases} U球体​={4πε0​q​2R1​(3−R2r2​)4πε0​q​r1​​r<Rr>R​

场强与电势关系

E⃗=−dUdne⃗n=−∇U\vec{E} = - \frac{\mathrm{d}U}{\mathrm{d}n} \vec{e}_n = - \nabla U E=−dndU​en​=−∇U

E⃗=−(∂xUi⃗+∂yUj⃗+∂zUk⃗)\vec{E} = - (\partial_x U \vec{i} + \partial_y U \vec{j} + \partial_z U \vec{k}) E=−(∂x​Ui+∂y​Uj​+∂z​Uk)

电容

常见电容器模型

求电容步骤

假设带电+q−q→求场强→求电势差→C=qUA−UBC0=εrC0假设带电 +q -q \rightarrow 求场强 \rightarrow 求电势差 \rightarrow C = \frac{q}{U_A - U_B} \quad C_0 = \varepsilon_r C_0 假设带电+q−q→求场强→求电势差→C=UA​−UB​q​C0​=εr​C0​

电物理量关系

D⃗→E⃗=D⃗εE⃗→P⃗=ε0χeE⃗P⃗→σ′=Pcos⁡θσ′\vec{D} \xrightarrow{\vec{E} = \frac{\vec{D}}{\varepsilon}} \vec{E} \xrightarrow{\vec{P} = \varepsilon_0 \chi_e \vec{E} } \vec{P} \xrightarrow{\sigma' = P \cos \theta}\sigma' DE=εD​​EP=ε0​χe​E​Pσ′=Pcosθ​σ′

其中，ε=ε0εrχe=εr−1σ′为极化电荷密度其中，\varepsilon = \varepsilon_0 \varepsilon_r \quad \chi_e = \varepsilon_r -1 \quad \sigma'为极化电荷密度 其中，ε=ε0​εr​χe​=εr​−1σ′为极化电荷密度

磁物理量关系

I→∮LH⃗⋅dl⃗=∑LIH⃗→B⃗=μH⃗B⃗→M⃗=χmH⃗M⃗→jm=Mjm→Im=jmlImI \xrightarrow{\oint_L \vec{H} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} = \sum_L I} \vec{H} \xrightarrow{\vec{B} = \mu \vec{H}} \vec{B} \xrightarrow{\vec{M} = \chi_m \vec{H}} \vec{M} \xrightarrow{j_m = M} j_m \xrightarrow{I_m = j_m l} I_m I∮L​H⋅dl=∑L​I​HB=μH​BM=χm​H​Mjm​=M​jm​Im​=jm​l​Im​

其中，μ=μ0μrχm=μr−1jm为磁化电流Im为束缚电流其中，\mu = \mu_0 \mu_r \quad \chi_m = \mu_r -1 \quad j_m为磁化电流 \quad I_m为束缚电流 其中，μ=μ0​μr​χm​=μr​−1jm​为磁化电流Im​为束缚电流

电磁感应

感应电动势

Ei=−dΦBdt=−ddt∬SB⃗⋅dS⃗\mathcal{E}_i = - \frac{\mathrm{d} \varPhi_B}{\mathrm{d} t} = -\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}t}\iint_S \vec{B} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{S} Ei​=−dtdΦB​​=−dtd​∬S​B⋅dS

动生电动势

E⃗K=v⃗×B⃗dEi=(v⃗×B⃗)⋅dl⃗\vec{E}_K = \vec{v} \times \vec{B} \quad \mathrm{d} \mathcal{E}_i = (\vec{v} \times \vec{B}) \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} EK​=v×BdEi​=(v×B)⋅dl

Ei=∫abE⃗K⋅dl⃗=∫ab(v⃗×B⃗)⋅dl⃗\mathcal{E}_i = \int^b_a \vec{E}_K \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} = \int_a^b (\vec{v} \times \vec{B}) \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} Ei​=∫ab​EK​⋅dl=∫ab​(v×B)⋅dl

E总=Ei时，Ei=−dΦBdt=−BdSdt\mathcal{E}_总 = \mathcal{E}_i时，\mathcal{E}_i = - \frac{\mathrm{d} \varPhi_B}{\mathrm{d} t} = - B \frac{\mathrm{d} S}{\mathrm{d} t} E总​=Ei​时，Ei​=−dtdΦB​​=−BdtdS​

涡旋电场

∮LE⃗i⋅dl⃗=−∬S∂B⃗∂t⋅dS⃗\oint_L \vec{E}_i \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} = - \iint_S \frac{\partial \vec{B}}{\partial t} \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{S} ∮L​Ei​⋅dl=−∬S​∂t∂B​⋅dS

Ei内=−r2dBdtE_{i内} = - \frac{r}{2} \frac{\mathrm{d} B}{\mathrm{d} t} Ei内​=−2r​dtdB​

Ei外=−R22rdBdtE_{i外} = - \frac{R^2}{2 r} \frac{\mathrm{d} B}{\mathrm{d} t} Ei外​=−2rR2​dtdB​

感生电动势

Ei=∫abE⃗i⋅dl⃗\mathcal{E}_{i} = \int_a^b \vec{E}_i \cdot \mathrm{d} \vec{l} Ei​=∫ab​Ei​⋅dl

E总=Ei时，Ei=−dΦBdt=−SdBdt\mathcal{E}_总 = \mathcal{E}_i时，\mathcal{E}_i = - \frac{\mathrm{d} \varPhi_B}{\mathrm{d} t} = - S \frac{\mathrm{d} B}{\mathrm{d} t} E总​=Ei​时，Ei​=−dtdΦB​​=−SdtdB​

互感

Φ2=MI1Φ2=MI2M=M21=M12\varPhi_2 = M I_1 \quad \varPhi_2 = M I_2 \quad M = M_{21} = M_{12} Φ2​=MI1​Φ2​=MI2​M=M21​=M12​

E2=−dΦB21dt∣I1E1=−dΦB12dt∣I2\mathcal{E}_2 = - \frac{\mathrm{d} \varPhi_{B21}}{\mathrm{d} t} \vert_{I_1} \quad \mathcal{E}_1 = - \frac{\mathrm{d} \varPhi_{B12}}{\mathrm{d} t} \vert_{I_2} E2​=−dtdΦB21​​∣I1​​E1​=−dtdΦB12​​∣I2​​

M=ΦmIM = \frac{\varPhi_m}{I} M=IΦm​​

符号规则

物距：与入射光同侧，s>0物距：与入射光同侧，s > 0 物距：与入射光同侧，s>0

单球面折射成像

n1s+n2s′=n2−n1R\frac{n_1}{s} + \frac{n_2}{s'} = \frac{n_2 - n_1}{R} sn1​​+s′n2​​=Rn2​−n1​​

薄透镜成像公式

1s+1s′=1fm=y′y=−s′s\frac{1}{s} + \frac{1}{s'} = \frac{1}{f} \quad m = \frac{y'}{y} = - \frac{s'}{s} s1​+s′1​=f1​m=yy′​=−ss′​

磨镜者公式

1f=(n−1)(1R1−1R2)\frac{1}{f} = (n - 1)(\frac{1}{R_1} - \frac{1}{R_2}) f1​=(n−1)(R1​1​−R2​1​)
